verses.verse: I waited <S%H6960><s%> patiently <S%H6960><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and he inclined <S%H5186><s%> unto me <S%H8085><s%>, and heard my cry <S%H7775><s%>.

He brought me up <S%H5927><s%> also out of a horrible <S%H7588><s%> pit <S%H953><s%>, out of the miry <S%H3121><s%> clay <S%H2916><s%>, and set <S%H6965><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> upon a rock <S%H5553><s%>, and established <S%H3559><s%> my goings <S%H838><s%>.

And he has put <S%H5414><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> in my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, even praise <S%H8416><s%> unto our God <S%H430><s%>: many <S%H7227><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H3372><s%>, and fear, and shall trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is that man <S%H1397><s%> that makes <S%H7760><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> his trust <S%H4009><s%>, and respects <S%H6437><s%> not the proud <S%H7295><s%>, nor such as turn aside <S%H7750><s%> to lies <S%H3577><s%>.

Many <S%H7227><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, are your wonderful <S%H6381><s%> works which you have done <S%H6213><s%>, and your thoughts <S%H4284><s%> which are to us-ward <S%H6186><s%>: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto you <S%H5046><s%>: if I would declare and speak <S%H1696><s%> of them <S%H6105><s%>, they are more than can be numbered <S%H5608><s%>.

Sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and offering <S%H4503><s%> you did not desire <S%H2654><s%>; my ears <S%H241><s%> have you opened <S%H3738><s%>: burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and sin offering <S%H2401><s%> have you not required <S%H7592><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> I <S%H935><s%>, Behold, I come: in the volume <S%H4039><s%> of the book <S%H5612><s%> it is written of me <S%H3789><s%>,
I delight <S%H2654><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> your will <S%H7522><s%>, O my God <S%H430><s%>: Yes <S%H8451><s%>, your law is inside <S%H8432><s%> my heart <S%H4578><s%>.

I have preached <S%H1319><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%> in the great <S%H7227><s%> congregation <S%H6951><s%>: behold <S%H3607><s%>, I have not refrained my lips <S%H8193><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, you know <S%H3045><s%>.

I have not hid <S%H3680><s%> your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> inside <S%H8432><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%>; I have declared <S%H559><s%> your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and your salvation <S%H8668><s%>: I have not concealed <S%H3582><s%> your lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and your truth <S%H571><s%> from the great <S%H7227><s%> congregation <S%H6951><s%>.

Withhold <S%H3607><s%> not you your tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> from me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord: let your lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and your truth <S%H571><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> preserve me <S%H5341><s%>.

For innumerable <S%H4557><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> have surrounded <S%H661><s%> me about <S%H5771><s%>: my iniquities have taken hold <S%H5381><s%> upon me <S%H3201><s%>, so that I am not able to look up <S%H7200><s%>; they are more <S%H6105><s%> than the hairs <S%H8185><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%>: therefore my heart <S%H3820><s%> fails me <S%H5800><s%>.
Be pleased <S%H7521><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to deliver <S%H5337><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>: O Lord, make haste <S%H2363><s%> to help me <S%H5833><s%>.

Let them be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H2659><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%> to destroy <S%H5595><s%> it <S%H5472><s%>; let them be driven backward <S%H268><s%> and put to shame <S%H3637><s%> that wish <S%H2655><s%> me evil <S%H7451><s%>.
Let them be desolate <S%H8074><s%> for a reward <S%H6118><s%> of their shame <S%H1322><s%> that say <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1889><s%>, Aha, aha <S%H1889><s%>.

Let all those that seek <S%H1245><s%> you rejoice <S%H7797><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> in you <S%H157><s%>: let such as love your salvation <S%H8668><s%> say <S%H559><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> be magnified <S%H1431><s%>.

But I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>; yet the Lord <S%H136><s%> thinks <S%H2803><s%> upon me <S%H5833><s%>: you are my help and my deliverer <S%H6403><s%>; make no delay <S%H309><s%>, O my God <S%H430><s%>.
